h2_title: Where to Find the Macaque Chief
h3_title: Macaque Chief Mini-Boss Fight and Guide
content: He can also heave his blade around that will send his body spinning, attacking with two quick spinning slice attacks. Often times he'll end up holding the blade with his foot, and perform a final upward slash as he backflips, sending out another projectile slash.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Macaque_Chief.md', within the main section titled 'Macaque Chief', specifically from the subsection 'Where to Find the Macaque Chief' and the sub-subsection 'Macaque Chief Mini-Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
He can also heave his blade around that will send his body spinning, attacking with two quick spinning slice attacks. Often times he'll end up holding the blade with his foot, and perform a final upward slash as he backflips, sending out another projectile slash.
